verification_steps.description: Verify the floating WhatsApp button appears on the tenant landing page
verification_steps.expected: Green WhatsApp FAB visible in bottom-right corner
verification_steps.notes: FAB found with aria-label Chat on WhatsApp, fixed position, z-40, bottom-6 right-6

verification_steps.description: Click the WhatsApp button and verify it opens WhatsApp with the correct number and message
verification_steps.expected: wa.me URL with cook phone and pre-filled message
verification_steps.notes: URL: wa.me/237670123456 with text param, target=_blank, rel=noopener noreferrer

verification_steps.description: Verify social media links in the footer open correct URLs in new tabs
verification_steps.expected: Facebook, Instagram, TikTok links with target=_blank
verification_steps.notes: All 3 social links verified: correct URLs, target=_blank, rel=noopener noreferrer, title attributes present

verification_steps.description: Verify only configured social links are shown
verification_steps.expected: Social section hidden when no links configured
verification_steps.notes: Cleared social links then Follow Us section disappeared. Restored then reappeared. BR-210 confirmed.

verification_steps.expected: tel: link present with mobile detection
verification_steps.notes: tel:+237680987654 link present, Alpine x-data has isMobile detection via ontouchstart/maxTouchPoints

verification_steps.description: Test copy-to-clipboard on desktop with success toast
verification_steps.expected: Clipboard copy and Phone number copied toast
verification_steps.notes: Clicked phone on desktop, toast Phone number copied appeared in DOM snapshot

verification_steps.description: Verify the WhatsApp button does not obstruct other elements on scroll
verification_steps.expected: FAB stays fixed, does not overlap nav or content
verification_steps.notes: FAB z-40 less than nav z-50, position fixed confirmed, scrolled through page with FAB staying in corner

edge_cases.expected: WhatsApp button hidden; phone section hidden; entire Get in Touch section hidden
edge_cases.notes: Cleared all contact info, FAB hidden, Get in Touch section hidden, only Powered by footer shown

edge_cases.expected: WhatsApp button stays fixed in viewport as user scrolls
edge_cases.notes: Verified position fixed with bottom 32px right 32px, stays visible during scroll
